com.ibm.team.interop.client.rest
Interface IInteropAdminRestClient

All Superinterfaces:
IInteropRestClient
public interface IInteropAdminRestClient
extends IInteropRestClient

Client library interface for the Interop administrative REST service.

Since:
0.7

isUserRegistryWritable

boolean isUserRegistryWritable()
                               throws InteropClientException
Determine whether the Jazz user registry is writable (i.e. allows users to be created).

Returns:
true if the user registry is writable; false if not
Throws:
InteropClientException - on error

createConnectorUser

void createConnectorUser(java.lang.String userId,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String emailAddress,
                         java.lang.String licenseId)
                         throws InteropClientException
Create a new user account for use by a connector client (i.e. the user account that will be used when invoking operations via the IInteropRestClient interface). The user is granted the "JazzUsers" role, but for write access to the repository, the caller must also specify an appropriate license to grant to the user.

Parameters:
userId - the user id; must not be null or empty
password - the password; if null, the userId is used as the initial password
userName - the user name; must not be null or empty
emailAddress - the user's email address; must not be null or empty
licenseId - the ID of a license to grant to the user account; may be null or empty (in which case an appropriate license must be granted later so that the user account has write privileges)
Throws:
InteropClientException - on error

connectorUserExists

boolean connectorUserExists(java.lang.String userId,
                            java.util.List licenseIds)
                            throws InteropClientException
Check whether a connector user account exists and has the correct attributes. The account is checked to make sure it is not archived, has the correct repository role, and is granted the given license, if specified.

Parameters:
userId - the user id; must not be null or empty
licenseIds - the IDs of licenses of which the user must be granted at least one; may be null or empty, in which case licenses are not checked
Returns:
true if an account for the user exists and has the correct attributes; false if the account does not exist
Throws:
InteropClientException - if the account exists but there is a problem with it (in which case the error message identifies the problem), or there is any other error

createExternalRepositoryConnection

IRestExternalRepositoryConnection createExternalRepositoryConnection()
Create a new external repository connection object in memory only. After setting properties on the object, it can be saved using #saveExternalRepositoryConnection(IExternalRepositoryConnection)

Returns:
a new, in-memory external repository connection object

saveExternalRepositoryConnection

void saveExternalRepositoryConnection(IRestExternalRepositoryConnection connection)
                                      throws InteropClientException
Save a new or modified external repository connection object.

Parameters:
connection - the external repository connection object to save; must not be null; may be a new or modified item
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getProjectArea

IInteropProjectAreaDTO getProjectArea(IRestExternalRepositoryConnection connection)
                                      throws InteropClientException
Get the project area associated with an external repository connection, if any.

Parameters:
connection - the external repository connection to get the project area for; must have previously been fetched from the server
Returns:
the associated project area object, or null if none
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

createSyncRule

IRestSyncRule createSyncRule()
Create a new SyncRule object in memory only. After setting properties on the object, it can be saved using IInteropAdminRestClient.saveSyncRule(IRestSyncRule)

Returns:
a new, in-memory SyncRule object

saveSyncRule

void saveSyncRule(IRestSyncRule syncRule)
                  throws InteropClientException
Save a new or modified SyncRule object.

Parameters:

Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

generateSyncConfiguration

void generateSyncConfiguration(java.lang.String projectAreaName,
                               java.lang.String externalConnectionName,
                               IManagerInfoDTO externalManagerInfo,
                               java.lang.String itemManagerId,
                               java.lang.String connectorUserId)
                               throws InteropClientException
Configure a project area for synchronization.

Parameters:
projectAreaName - the name of project area to configure
externalConnectionName - the name of the external repository connection to use
externalManagerInfo - external manager information and supported type info; note that only the external manager ID need be supplied; any name is ignored
itemManagerId - if generating or updating an item type definition, the identifier of the manager to invoke, else null
connectorUserId - the user id that the external connector client will log in as, to be given access to the project area; if null, then the no special access is granted and may need to be configured manually
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error
